page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: YARDGAMES ARE A PART OF CHILDREN'S LIFE STYLE.HERE IS A LIST OF YARD GAMES PLAYED AT NORTHFIELD MANOR SCHOOL IN BIRMINGHAM AND A DESCRIPTION OF THE MOST POPULAR GAMES PLAYED.BRITISH BULL DOG,CAT AND MOUSE,AND AKI 1 2 3 WERE THE MOST POPULAR GAMES.HOPSCOTCH WAS THE LEAST POPULAR.HERE IS A DESCRIPTION OF CAT AND MOUSE:THE GAME IS PLAYED WITH 4 OR MORE PEOPLE.EVERY PERSON HAS A PARTNER EXCEPT FOR 2 PEOPLE WHO ARE THE CAT AND MOUSE.THE CAT CHASES THE MOUSE BUT THE MOUSE CAN LINK ARMS WITH A PERSON WHO HAS A PARTNER.THEN THAT PARNER BECOMES THE MOUSE AND HAS TO BREAK AWAY AND AVOID THE CATR.IF THE MOUSE GETS CAUGHT BY THE CAT,THE CAT BECOMES THEMOUSE AND THE MOUSE BECOMES THE CAT.
